title: Gauntlets of War
data:
{{version030}} {{flavour|A pair of thick steel gauntlets. They were Okawaru's reward for a mighty warlord. The owner is destined to die in battle, but what a death it will be!}} [[File:Gauntlets_of_war.png]] '''''the +3 pair of gauntlets of War'''''
+3 [[gloves]]
+5 [[slaying]] ==Desirability== The '''gauntlets of War'''{{source ref|0.30.0|art-data.txt|937}} provide a solid chunk of general defense and a +5 [[slaying]] bonus in the gloves slot. A good pair of [[randart]] gloves might be better for casters, but these are definitely better than any regular [[gloves]] (if only due to the defense). ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Gloves]]
